scripts.cypress:local: cypress open --e2e --env env=local,TAGS="not (@test or @dev or @ignoreLocal or @ignore)"
scripts.cypress:local:all: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=local,TAGS="not (@test or @dev or @ignoreLocal or @ignore)" --headed --headed && npm run report
scripts.cypress:dev:all: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=dev,TAGS="not (@test or @ignore)" && npm run report
scripts.cypress:test:all: export CYPRESS_ENV=test && npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=test,TAGS="@runthis and not (@dev or @ignore)" && npm run report
scripts.delete:reports: rm -rf report/JSON/* || true; rm -rf report/HTML/* || true; rm -rf cypress/videos/features/* || true
